item.title: My LaTeX dissertation template
item.description: I wrote my PhD dissertation in LaTeX, assuming it would be easier to use (in the long run!) compared to a standard text editor like Pages or Word. Pages does not support all of the functions needed for a beautiful dissertation (step up your game, Apple) and I dislike working in Word. Preferably, I would have written my dissertation in Markdown, but that also seems too limited for a dissertation. Hence, LaTeX.
